data.actual_result: Discord keeps crashing over and over when starting the app. It's hard to disable the game detection quickly before a crash.
data.expected_result: Discord should detect the game without problems
data.short_description: Discord keeps crashing when game detection is enabled
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the settings and select "Games" - Enable the feature to allow Discord to detect games and give it the permission when prompted
